I watch my old home videos to feel nostalgic and remember the good times.
I play my guitar to express my feelings.

participant_2.background:
I have a pet dog that helps me cope with my emotions.
i ve never been to the west coast of the united states.
i did not finish college.
I'm a teacher who cares about my students' success.
i have two full sleeves of tattoos.

content.text: Hey, did you have a good day?
It was pretty good, thanks! I'm a teacher, and I really love my job. I love seeing my students succeed.
That's awesome! What kind of things do you teach?
I teach English. I love reading and writing, and I love getting to share that with my students.
That's really cool! I love writing too. I'm a video game designer, and I love using writing to create stories and characters for my games.
Oh, that's so cool! I've never been a big gamer, but I can appreciate the creativity that goes into making a video game.
Thanks! It's a lot of fun, but it can also be really challenging.
I can imagine! I'm sure it's a lot of hard work, but it's worth it when you see the finished product.
Exactly! It's really rewarding to see people enjoying the games that I've created.
I bet it is! I'm glad you have a job that you love.
Thanks! I'm really lucky to have found something that I'm passionate about.
Me too! I love teaching, and I can't imagine doing anything else.
I'm glad to hear that! It's important to find something that you love to do, and it sounds like you've found it.
